trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_SEQ_00<tab>What's a musicking station without handheld carrotlights? A <var 1A 02 /var>sad<var 1A 01 /var> musicking station. And Managingway won't stand for it.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Keepingway.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Keepingway.

TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>According to recent surveys, the availability of handheld carrotlights has dramatically increased overall musicking satisfaction.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>But a review of data from the past three cycles reveals that we must increase production of said lights by six percent if we are to meet current demand.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>I have asked Keepingway to procure additional supplies and begin assembly immediately, so could you offer them your assistance?
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_KEEPINGWAY_000_010<tab>By my whiskers am I glad to see you! When Managingway told me how many lights we needed to make, I thought I might cry.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_KEEPINGWAY_000_011<tab>We're currently short on decorative parts, so could you handle those? The doing supporter is stocked with extra materials if you need them.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_KEEPINGWAY_000_012<tab>We're currently short on handles, so could you craft some of those? The doing supporter is stocked with extra materials if you need them.

TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_KEEPINGWAY_000_013<tab>We're currently short on glowy bits...um, the things that make the carrotlights light up? Y-You probably know better than I do! The doing supporter is stocked with extra materials if you need them.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_KEEPINGWAY_000_014<tab>When you've finished, go and tell Managingway. I'll have the others start assembling from the pieces we have!
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_SUPPORTER04693_000_015<tab>Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Please use what you have before asking for more─always clean your plate!
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_SUPPORTER04693_000_016<tab>Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Please use what you have before asking for more─always clean your plate!
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_SUPPORTER04693_000_017<tab>Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Please use what you have before asking for more─always clean your plate!
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_SUPPORTER04693_000_018<tab>Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Congratulations! You have been recognized as “needy.” Procuring additional materials now.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_SUPPORTER04693_000_019<tab>Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Congratulations! You have been recognized as “needy.” Procuring additional materials now.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_SUPPORTER04693_000_020<tab>Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Congratulations! You have been recognized as “needy.” Procuring additional materials now.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_MANAGINGWAY_000_030<tab>How goes carrotlight production? Have we reached our six percent?
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_MANAGINGWAY_000_031<tab>Oh, thank goodness! With this, our Ways should be sufficiently supplied with carrotlights for the time being.
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_MANAGINGWAY_000_032<tab>We have also received requests for a wider variety of colors, as well as improvements to the carrotlights' basic functionality. Exciting times await!
TEXT_BANLOP107_04693_MANAGINGWAY_000_033<tab>I hope I can count on your future assistance, but for now, please accept this small token of our appreciation.
